tags: None
review:
Our experience has been good..we are consulting him for our son (since his birth) who is now 1 year old..he is also guiding about diet for the child..my son has fallen sick two to three times in recent past..on one occasion, when he was suffering‚Äã with cough, cold and fever, we took him to Dr Nilesh, who prescribed treatment as per viral infections ( prescribed nebulisation with saline) and did not prescribe any antibiotics ..our son got well in 3-4 days..
However, next time he showed similar symptoms and we took him to Dr Nilesh, who did not prescribe antibiotics and continued with the same treatment..but it turned out to be bacterial infection and my son condition worsened..he started wheezing..since we could not get appointment again for Dr Nilesh, we took him to cloud nine Whitefield.. finally with doses of antibiotics and nebulisation with medicines, he was cured..but it took 6-7 days to cure ************ barring this our experience with him has been satisfactory.. 
Getting appointment is difficult at times, even though we keep requesting cloud nine staffs, they did not allow us to consult him through walk in..
I feel that hospital should try to accommodate walk in cases in case of emergency and allow to consult Mr Nilesh without prior appointment..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are consulting Dr. Nilesh for my son since his birth. I am having great experience with the him & the way he treats the babies. It gives a booster for mothers to listen to his way of assessing babies & monitoring their progress. Some of the unknown facts about babies eating pattern & diet was explained very clearly.He is very soft spoken, talks to the point and catches what should be the correct stage of child's development. Ensures baby is growing at right pace. Tells Do's and dont's for future. He believes in less medication and I prefer him over any other doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
He is the doctor to whom I consult for my one yr old son since his birth.

Everything is fine about him, no doubt about it but frankly not on a couple of aspect out of my experience.

He mostly rushes while consulting during his busy schedule in an intension to move to next. He examine my kid well but I wish he should also do it based on the patient's previos records/file until I remind him on the problems my kid had during his birth. 

Apart from that he is so friendly and good at his experience with diagnosis. He advises me well on dos and don't s that helps to grow my kid well. Thanks much to the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: From my baby born to till now we only visited Nilesh sir  and he is such a great doctor.His smiling face in-depth study of the details regarding issues and the explanation is just spectacular.Not only he will explain the health issues you informed about your baby but he will do a routine checkup from his side and explain everything which is wonderful.Doctors are the 2nd god that‚Äôs what he proved many time.Thank you so much sir for being there with us always üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We waited for 45 mins to see Dr Nilesh for my sons cough, cold, weight gain & allergy problems. We were called in and he examined the childs cough and asked questions on symptoms. After that, when we were about to tell him the next problem the child was facing when he interupted and called the next patient. But I insisted that my child has some rash. So, he suddenly got impatient and rudely replied that we should have told this before. He did not even examine my child and turned the other way without acknowledging.

Most of the time, he will only talk and not let patient describe the complaints. Infact in name of friendliness, ** **** * *** ********* ** * *** ******* ********* **** ***** * ***** *** **** *** ** * ***** ******** *** ********* ****** ****** ******* *** ******** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nilesh is very rude and always in hurry , doesn't listen to our concerns. He was in hurry to move on to next patient. We travelled 1hr, waited 1hr, paid 850, appointment  finished in 2 mins.  He doesn't spare 2 mins more listening to your concerns. We took our 6year old for cold and cough, after that we wanted to discuss about other concerns we had related to some skin allergies. Doctor got irritated and told you should explain everything one shot, I can't spare time checking him again and again. I have other patients to see. Later he checked and said it is nothing we are done. My son was still sitting on the bed he said get him down, take your file and leave. ******** ********* I wouldn't recommend him to anyone. I had a huge respect for cloudnine and the way they handle kids. We were in shock to see how unfriendly this doctor was. To add on that doctor gave a candy to sick kid and outside in the waiting they are distributing complimentary canned juices. * *** ******* ** *** ******** ************************ **** ******* my 6 year old is saying Doctor only gave chocolate, hospital only distributing packaged juice. ***** ***** ** ** ******** *** ***** *** ***** ** ** ********* **** ******* ****** ******* ** ****** ******* ******* ****** *** ****** ****** ** *** ********* We still hold Hospitals and Doctors with high regard, kids believe whatever you say is true please educate children about healthy eating* ****** **** ************ **** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: My frist time experience is bad, he doesn't listen and speaks a lot. Doesn't close his door while talking to us.  So I can't understand more than half of what he is saying.  He looks like he is in lot of hurry.. if a doctor doesn't have time better not to give appointment.. As a first time parent we have lot of concerns but he doesn't  seems to care much as he is busy in typing and speaking.

tags: None
review: *** ****** ** **** ************** He is very clam and make visit very pleasant for both baby and parents. ** *** ***** ********* ***** ****** ********** suggests us what we can feed baby for better health and growth, he will answer all questions which a new mom has. We recommend dr nileash to every parent.

tags: None
review: Very very good doc cz he asks questions, asks if we r worrying abt anything related to our baby. He is friendly enough that we can ask him any sort of questions.. Assures that our baby will be fine hearty and healthy and we need not worry.. Suggests options and ways how can we solve any issues.. it was our first time and from now on he will be our super doc..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My son who is 2 yrs old, he had rashes on his face. Dr Nilesh prescribed good cream  (but he never recommended any medicines for that) and Now his rashes are almost gone.
Infact he always recommends light medicines to my son so that his immunity develops... We trust him so much, that we never give any medicine (recommended by any doc) to my son without discussing with Doc Nilesh.

I would recommend all parents to consult him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would like to thanks Dr NIlesh Rao . We had visited there as my daughter was having high fever and she is only 1 year old . The way he treated and the way he has consulted us was a stress relief . Have met a genuine Dr in Banaglore after ages , the medicines given by the Dr did not cost us more than 50 rs Yes really shocked to hear that myself . But the medicines did wonder and all looks good with my daughters health.

tags: None

Dr Nilesh is very patient with the kids and provides us with valuable suggestions regarding the nutrition that can help kids more in the natural way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Excellent..  We have been visiting this doctor from the time my daughter was born. The medication he prescribes is awsm. I am completely satisfied with the treatment.  My daughter says he's a good doctor otherwise it is very difficult to take her to a doctor.  
We have also recommended Dr. Niles Roa to my friends too.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor Nilesh Nikilesh is  very good. He calmly listen to the problems and he detailly check baby and tells us about the problem and precautions. He doesn't make fear. He doesn't make unnecessary things to do for kids like blood test and all without proper diagnosis. I m very satisfied with Dr. Nilesh and I would like to recommend him for others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Nilesh is a pleasant doctor to visit. Listens carefully and ensures you get the right clarification. I visit him most of the times for health issues of my daughter(2.9months old). Always returned happy and satisfied. Would like to recommend to visit him for all those anxious parents who needs a doctor like him üòä thank you doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Nilesh is my son's second doctor... due to unavailability of first doctor during my son's vaccination time we were proposed to Nilesh. Nilesh had explained us many important points about baby health and growth even after knowing that my son was treated or consulted by first doctor. Very genuine way to treat patient and family...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We went to the doctor with our 8 days old baby.Doctor saw her and asked for belerubin test since she had it earlier.Doctor answered all our questions calmly and asked us to show the report once test is done.Everything went fine till this.
We finished the test and waited for 2 hours to get the report.Test report was normal.When we went to doctor to show the report,he was in hurry and saw the report somehow and said everything all right.
After we reached home,we got a call from cloudnine that doctor Nilesh asked us to repeat the test which certainly doctor didnot telk us.Either this is a mishap from cloudnine while making test report  or doctor didnot examine the test report properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr is friendly. Only concern is with lab testing reports. My son suffered with viral fever for more than 4days. When Dr asked us to take urine, blood and H1N1 test, we did it in the same hospital lab. Test results are, no viral infection in urine and blood report. But they gave H1N1 has positive and they asked us to admit my son. Seriously I was not satisfied with that result, and immediately we went to Coimbatore hospital on the same day. There we took all the test again *** *** ******* *** ******** ** ****** ** **** ****** *** **** ***** ** ***** ********** We really pissed off with lab report and Dr treatment.. We almost spent 15K for the lab test in Cloud Nine. *** ** ******* ******** ****** ** ********** *** **** *** *** ***** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Paediatric Critical Care,Paediatrics - Chest,Pediatric Vaccinations,Growth & Development Evaluation / Management,
review: Dr Nilesh is truly a remarkable doctor and professional that we respect and trust for our baby. We visit him since the day our baby was born.. he is very caring and loving to his patients! Patience, tolerance and intelligence, he as all these in him. We were in hurry to take antibiotic for fever and cough but he has never suggested for that and always recommend to do neutralization and medications which are safe and effective for our child. His smile and kind words heals half of our tension for our baby's health! Keep it up Dr Nilesh and hope you do more progress in the future.

tags: None
review: My Son has cold, cough, Fever. Dr Nilesh is very proficient to treat all the issues. He will not be in hurry. He gives enough time to ask our concerns. He will suggest for natural remedies first and then medicines next. I am very happy to take treatment from Dr Nilesh for my son for any issues.

tags: None
review: Dr. Nilesh is a super cool doctor we've come across, He explains everything well, informative and more than happy to go above and beyond to make sure the visitor/patient is comfortable. Thank you for the extra time in explianing, answering for our questions.

tags: None
